name: @doinn/capacitor-video-compressor
description: Native video compression for Capacitor using AVAssetExportSession (iOS) and MediaCodec Surface-to-Surface pipeline (Android)
author: Doinn

scripts.verify: npm run verify:ios && npm run verify:android && npm run verify:web
scripts.verify:ios: cd ios && pod install && xcodebuild -workspace Plugin.xcworkspace -scheme Plugin -destination generic/platform=iOS build
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run prettier -- --check
scripts.fmt: npm run eslint -- --fix && npm run prettier -- --write
scripts.release:patch: yarn build && npm version patch && git add -A && git commit -m "release: $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: yarn build && npm version minor && git add -A && git commit -m "release: $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: yarn build && npm version major && git add -A && git commit -m "release: $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags
